page.discussion: The a5_CSS_Combine function combines to in-line style definitions. For example, if the in-line style for an element is "text-align: right;" and you add in "color:red;", the combined style is: "text-align:right; color:red;"
page.example: if e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Total < 10 then e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total = a5_CSS_Combine(e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total,"color: red;") else if e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Total >= 10 .and. e.summaryValues.QUANTITY.Total < 20 then e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total = a5_CSS_Combine(e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total,"color: blue;") else e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total = a5_CSS_Combine(e.summaryStyle.QUANTITY.Total,"color: green") end if
